Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Visionary \Vi"sion*a*ry\, n.; pl. {Visionaries}. 1. One whose imagination is disturbed; one who sees visions or phantoms. [1913 Webster]
2. One whose imagination overpowers his reason and controls his judgment; an unpractical schemer; one who builds castles in the air; a daydreamer. [1913 Webster]
